bibl.title: Ethnic Cleansing in Roman Alexandria in 38. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The Roman context. - Race riots in Alexandria. - Background and causes of the riots. - The role of the 'Egyptians'. - Some concerns of the Alexandrian Greeks. - Towards a reconciliation. - Bibliography.
bibl.seg: ATKINSON John, Ethnic Cleansing in Roman Alexandria in 38. Avec résumé en anglais.
